colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED @008A *, ,SGRUB PA'I THO YIG SKU GSUM CHAR 'BEBS DNGOS GRUB KYI RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG DON GNYER CAN DU MAS YANG YANG BSKUL ZHING, KHYAD PAR DU YE SHES MGON PO MNGON SUM DU BZHUGS PA'I, SPO BO CHU DMO'I NYE CHAR GYI RI KHROD DGA' LDAN CHOS 'PHEL GYI SLOB DPON YE SHES BZANG POS SNGA SOR NYIN BDE BYU RU CHE LEGS, SPOS SHEL CHE LEGS, DNGUL SOGS DANG BCAS BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG NYIN BDE GSER DNGUL SOGS DANG BCAS PA BSKUL BA'I NGOR SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG MANG THOS SPONG BA PA 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES YOS KYI LO ZLA BA BRGYAD PA'I TSES BCVO LNGAR BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RGYAS SHING MKHAS GRUB KYIS SA KUN KHYAB PAR GYUR CIG ,
